markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Tyrannosaurus Skeleton](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1299)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A massive dinosaur predator makes for a fearsome skeleton.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Skeleton_TRexSkeleton.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Tyrannosaurus Skeleton](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1299)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 237</row>

**Perception** +17; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +22

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +0

**Con** +5

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +20 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +17 

</row>

**HP** 140
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
cold 10, electricity 10, fire 10, piercing 10, slashing 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +20 ([deadly d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+9 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +20 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+9 bludgeoning

**Rib Skewer** <actions string="Single Action" />  The tyrannosaurus skeleton bends down, attempting to skewer one adjacent creature on one of its massive ribs. The creature takes 2d10+9 piercing damage (DC 28 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). If the creature fails its save and is Medium or smaller, it's also impaled and stuck to the rib. It moves with the skeleton and takes 2d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) until it either [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) or someone uses [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=34) to break the rib (either is DC 28).

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Huge or smaller, foot, DC 28

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-92" />
name: Tyrannosaurus Skeleton

text: Tyrannosaurus Skeleton A massive dinosaur predator makes for a fearsome skeleton. Recall Knowledge - Undead (Religion): DC 26 Unspecific Lore : DC 24 Specific Lore : DC 21 Tyrannosaurus Skeleton Source Bestiary 3 pg. 237 Perception +17; darkvision Languages Skills Athletics +22 Str +7 Dex +0 Con +5 Int -5 Wis +2 Cha +0 --- AC 27 Fort +20 Ref +13 Will +17 HP 140 (negative healing) Immunities death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious Resistances cold 10, electricity 10, fire 10, piercing 10, slashing 10 --- Speed 40 feet Melee Single Action jaws +20 (deadly d12, reach 20 feet), Damage 2d12+9 piercing plus Grab Melee Single Action foot +20 (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d10+9 bludgeoning Rib Skewer Single Action The tyrannosaurus skeleton bends down, attempting to skewer one adjacent creature on one of its massive ribs. The creature takes 2d10+9 piercing damage (DC 28 basic Reflex save). If the creature fails its save and is Medium or smaller, it's also impaled and stuck to the rib. It moves with the skeleton and takes 2d6 persistent bleed damage until it either Escapes or someone uses Force Open to break the rib (either is DC 28). Trample Three Actions Huge or smaller, foot, DC 28
